attributes.action: Implement and promote Allen Carr stop smoking method on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want to see Allen Carr stop smoking method promoted on the NHS instead of prescribing NRT which just keeps smokers addicted whilst lining the pockets of the treasury.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
